mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "工程表" ( "品目コード", "工順", "工程コード", "標準作業時間", "段取時間", "作成日時", "更新日時" ) VALUES ( #{itemCode}, #{sequence}, #{processCode}, #{standardTime}, #{setupTime}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM "工程表" ORDER BY "品目コード", "工順"
mapper.update: UPDATE "工程表" SET "工程コード" = #{processCode}, "標準作業時間" = #{standardTime}, "段取時間" = #{setupTime}, "更新日時" = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE "品目コード" = #{itemCode} AND "工順" = #{sequence}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM "工程表" WHERE "品目コード" = #{itemCode}
